name: Monthly Support Raffle by AAMP - $ for Causes, $ for the Arts, and the Arts for you.
description:
Congrats to online winner from the last raffle, Joshua B.

50% of this month's proceeds are going to a local battered women's home and to breast cancer research.

We are back at it again. This month's raffle will feature an original hat by MC MEGA, a copy of Sully's "Seven Deadly Sins", and more. 

Winner will be announced Jan. 11th live at our next charity event, this is an open invitation as well for any creatives who want to participate.

We will be donating 50% of the proceeds to several local causes aiding terminally ill children in their daily struggle, or other like causes - while the other 50% will be recycled into the fund to keep the raffle going for us to get merch and art from the next artists and musicians participating.

This is the formula:
Every month we will hold this online raffle
Every moth we will pay the artists and musicians in full for their pieces 
Every month we will donate funds raised to certain causes of our choice, which will be posted and tracked. 

You the customer and supporter get the art, clothing and music for next to nothing while everyone's getting taken care of.

so for 2$ you can help support local creatives, help make a difference in someone's lives as well as feed your art/music appreciative side. 

Share this link, ( or don't if you wan to win it all for yourself haha)

But for $2.00 and all the positivity surrounding this - it's a no brainer. Help us, help them, help you. One love

- Appassionato Art and Music Promotions

name: Basic Hip Hop Head Logo
description:
The first design from Appassionato will never get old. Printed in any color, in any size, & on virtually anything you request. Starting T-shirt orders at $7.00 

Any shirt sizes under Large will receive the traditional center hit, anything over Large will receive the side hit like the image included. 

Order here, If you would like to specify a shirt color or size please e-mail me at shopappassionato@ymail.com

Otherwise place the order here and select the color & size options available. 

Any shirt sizes over XL tend to cost a few dollars more bc of manufacturing, and for any other colors than what is offered here there will be a $5.00 charge 

If you select any size over XL or any other color than is offered please choose the $12.00 option and e-mail me at shopappassionato@ymail.com to specify what you'd like.

Medium Heather Grey w/ Purple Ink

name: I HRT MUSIC/ I LOVE (hip hop) HEAD
description:
Zealous Creative and Appassionato Collab Unisex Pullover Hood - 

available in Black and Charcoal w/ purple ink. Other pullover colors available upon request. email shopappassionato@ymail.com for custom requests in size, colors and images.
